1.title: TIKBALANG: The Horse Demon
1.plot: In the Philippine forest is said to lurk a creature, part man, part horse known for its speed and mischievous nature. THE ASWANG PROJECT explores the origin, history and evolution of the Tikbalang.

2.title: KAPRE: The Tree Dweller
2.plot: If you notice the scent of tobacco in the Philippine jungle, see the glow of embers near a giant tree, or you feel the eyes of an 8 foot beast upon you while you sleep, it might just be the Kapre.

3.title: BAKUNAWA: The Moon Eater
3.plot: During a lunar eclipse in the ancient Philippines, it was believed that a monstrous dragon, known as BAKUNAWA, was attempting to swallow the moon. Discover the origin of this giant serpent.

imdb.plot outline: Very little is known about the history and evolution of Philippine Mythological Creatures. Early animist societies of the Philippines were were wary of entities that lurked in the shadows. These creatures transcended time, religion and colonialism. The Creatures of Philippine Mythology studies their unique origin, history and evolution into the modern era.
imdb.title: Creatures of Philippine Mythology
plot: Very little is known about the history and evolution of Philippine Mythological Creatures. But these creatures transcended time, religion and colonialism. This show studies their unique origin and evolution into the modern era.

Very little is known about the history and evolution of Philippine Mythological Creatures. Early animist societies of the Philippines were were wary of entities that lurked in the shadows. These creatures transcended time, religion and colonialism. The _Creatures of Philippine Mythology_ (qv) studies their unique origin, history and evolution into the modern era.
